mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tMember (sId, sPassword, sSalt, sName, sEmail, sPhone, dtRegDate) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, NOW())

SELECT sSalt as salt FROM tMember WHERE sId = #{id}
